document.topic_text: Police on scene of barricade situation in Hampton Staff , WVEC 1:26 PM. EST April 25, 2016 Hampton police on scene of a barricade situation in the first block of East Preston Street on April 25, 2016. (Photo: Hampton Police Department) HAMPTON, Va. (WVEC) -- Hampton police are on the scene of a barricade situation involving an armed subject in the first block of East Preston Street, just off North King Street. Police released a tweet shortly before 2 p.m. about the incident. No other information is available at this time. Stay with 13News Now for updates. Hampton police on scene in the first block of East Preston Street in reference to an armed barricaded subject. More info to come. — Hampton VA Police (@HamptonVAPolice) April 25, 2016
